PageTitle: peer local-graceful-restart timer restart (BGP-VPN instance view)
FuncDef:
The peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command sets the maximum duration for a device to wait for the BGP peer relationship with a specified peer to be reestablished. After this command is run, the device will not advertise the maximum duration to the specified peer.
The undo peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command deletes the configured duration. The peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command sets the maximum duration for a device to wait for the BGP peer relationship with a specified peer to be reestablished. After this command is run, the device will not advertise the maximum duration to the specified peer. The undo peer local-graceful-restart timer restart command deletes the configured duration. By default, a device waits for the peer relationship with a peer to be reestablished for a maximum of 150 seconds.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 peer address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the maximum time for the local end to wait for GR recovery of the peer.
The value is an integer ranging from 3 to 3600, in seconds.

Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The address is in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.
